column14: Press {01C280} to attack and {01C298} to defend.
Tap {01C280} repeatedly to perform a combo attack.
{01C299} Fire tiny bursts of magic energy.
Dispatch a magical doppelganger to attack nearby enemies.<LF>Charge to increase attack range.
Pummel foes with a powerful magical arm.<LF>Charge to increase the size of the arm.
{01C29C} Launch a devastating magical spear.<LF>Charge to increase the number of spears.
Attack with magical rotating blades.<LF>Charge to increase the number of blades.
Absorb enemy magic attacks.<LF>Charge to increase absorption time.
Erect a magical defensive barrier.<LF>Charge to increase the size of the wall.
Summon magical spikes from the ground to impale enemies.<LF>Charge to increase the number of spikes.
Press {01C286} to display a map of the current area (if you have one).
Walk up to a character or object and press {017E} to interact with it.
When fighting large enemies, attack gauges will often appear<LF>on specific parts of their bodies. Destroy those parts within<LF>the time limit to defeat the enemy.
Examine a mailbox to save your progress.
Some villagers may ask you to perform jobs for them.<LF>To view any such requests, press {01C285} to open the menu,<LF>select Grimoire Weiss, then choose the Quests tab.
There are three kinds of weapons: one-handed swords, two-handed swords, and spears.
Examine the field next to <NIER>'s house to plant any seeds in your possession.<LF>Over time, the seeds will grow into flowers, fruits, and vegetables that you can harvest.
You can strengthen your weapons by bringing the required materials<LF>to the Two Brothers Weaponry shop at the Junk Heap and paying a fee.
You can buy and sell items, weapons, and materials at shops.

Use {01C2B6} to change the direction of your magical attacks while riding a mine cart.<LF><LF>Also, the speed of the mine cart can be increased by moving toward the forward-end<LF>and decreased by moving toward the back-end.
Press {01C285} to open the menu, then select Magic/Abilities to set your magic and abilities.

When "{017E}Fish" is displayed on the screen, press {017E} to<LF>choose your bait and begin fishing. When your rod bends,<LF>press {017E} to hook the fish, then tilt {01C2B5} in the direction<LF>opposite the fish's current position to reduce its HP.<LF>When the fish's HP reaches zero, you will automatically land it.
Press {01C285} to open the menu, then select Documents from<LF>Grimoire Weiss's Notes tab to view your letters and memos.
Press {01C28A} to change your equipped weapon.
Stand next to a movable box, then hold {017E} and move<LF>your character toward or away from the box to push it<LF>or pull it. Move boxes as needed to create a path forward.
Hold the Attack or Magic buttons to charge your attacks, altering their effects.<LF>This can be performed at any point during a combo attack.
Press {01C298}+{01C280} to damage a downed enemy.
Press {017F} while airborne for a skull-cracking special attack. (Swords only.)
Press {01C298} at the right moment to deflect an enemy's attack and throw it off balance,<LF>then immediately swing your weapon to unleash a devastating counterattack.
Press {017F} for a dash charge. (Spears only.)
Press {017F} while airborne for an air-dash charge. (Spears only.)
Press {017F} for a spinning attack. (Two-handed swords only.)
Hold {01C2B5} in the direction of an enemy and press {01C297} to sidestep behind them.
Press {01C280} at the right moment after a sidestep for a unique attack.
Hold down the Magic button during a combo to add a charged magical attack to the chain.
Some enemies are impervious to magic. You must defeat these enemies with regular weaponry.
Press {01C298} to recover quickly when blown back by an enemy.
You can use the cancel function to recover, even in midair.
Press {017F} after recovering in midair to execute your weapon's special attack.
If your attack is blocked, you can break the enemy's guard by continuing to attack.
Press {017F} to unleash heavy attacks that can more easily break an enemy's guard.
Instead of selling raw materials to shops, look for someone<LF>who needs the material. You'll often earn more that way.
Different baits can cause different fish to bite, even if you're fishing the same spot.
You can catch fish at some spots in the desert sand.
Completing certain quests will raise your fishing skill, making it easier to catch larger fish.
You can use {017D} to reel in a fish even if its HP is not completely depleted.<LF>The more HP it has, the less likely you'll land the fish.
Some fish can be used as bait to catch bigger fish.
Magical attacks can knock armor off enemies, making them more susceptible to physical attacks.
Mount/Dismount: {017E}<LF>Move: {01C2B5}<LF>Accelerate: {01C284}<LF>Drift: Hold {01C283} and move {01C2B5} left or right while accelerating.
Pick up/Drop: {017E}<LF>Throw: {01C2B5}+{017E}
Some boxes can be destroyed by attacking them.
Some barriers can be destroyed with explosives.
You may occasionally see a sparkling point on your travels. Examine it to receive items.
Some required items may be hidden in the field.<LF>Search for sparkling points or break wooden boxes to obtain the items inside.

You may occasionally obtain words from fallen enemies.<LF>Select Word Edit from the Grimoire Weiss menu to assign<LF>these words to magic, weapons, or martial arts.<LF>This can add a variety of powerful effects!
Select Orders with {01C285} to direct your allies in battle.
Some animals, including escaped ones, can be called to you by selecting Orders with {01C285}.
Items: {01C287}<LF>Two-handed swords: {01C288}<LF>Spears: {01C289}<LF>One-handed swords: {01C28A}
While near a wall in midair, press {01C2B5}+{01C297} to perform a wall kick.
At the end of a one-handed sword combo performed with {01C280},<LF>press {017F} to execute a heavy attack and cut down the time<LF>between one combo and the next.
You can avoid damage and absorb MP by attacking enemies' magic orbs with your weapon.
Enemies normally unaffected by magical attacks<LF>may become vulnerable to them when they're down.
If a wolf bites you, tap {01C280} repeatedly to shake it off.
The first bolt of a Dark Blast is stronger than the rest.<LF>To rapid-fire these powerful blasts, tap {01C299} repeatedly instead of holding it down.

The amount of items you can harvest from your field depends on fertilizer and water supply.<LF>Watering frequency only affects plants at each stage of growth, so try watering a little bit over a long period of time.
In addition to normal items, some enemies have a small chance of dropping rare items.
Press {01C28B} to switch between targeting modes whilst attacking with Dark Lance.
Items found in the field respawn when you change maps, allowing you to collect them over and over.
Blood that sprays from defeated enemies is automatically absorbed for an MP boost.
If your magic collides with an enemy's,<LF>the stronger magic will cancel the weaker one.<LF>If they are equally strong, they will cancel each other out.
Load your clear data after completing the game to experience Kainé's story.
Obtain all of the weapons in the game and you'll be able to make one final decision that affects the story.
Your choice in this decision could allow you to view the very last piece of the ending.
Press {01C297} to perform an evasive roll.<LF>Keep holding {01C2B5} after evading to sprint.
After jumping with {017D}, press {017D} again while airborne to perform a second, mid-air jump.
Press {01C285} to open the menu and navigate to "Skills/Abilities"<LF>to change what skills and abilities you have equipped.
Enabling Weapon Quick-Switching via the settings menu will allow you to<LF>instantly switch weapon types by pressing {01C28A}.
Press {017E} near a fallen foe to deal serious damage.
Press and hold {01C285} to instantly edit your magic and ability slots.

Press {01C28B} to set a nearby foe as your target.<LF>Move {01C2B6} left or right while locked on to switch targets.<LF>Note that {01C28B}'s function will change to "pause auto-battle" when auto-battle is active.
Press and hold {01C285} to instantly edit your skill and ability slots.
Look along the bottom of the screen displayed with {01C285} to check what you should do next.
Certain enemy attacks are capable of inflicting poison status.<LF>Poison will clear up on its own after enough time has passed,<LF>but it can also be cured right away by using an antidotal weed.

Press {01C280}/{01C2A3} to attack and {01C298} to defend.
Tap {01C280}/{01C2A3} repeatedly to perform a combo attack.

Use {01C290}{01C291}{01C292}{01C293} to change the direction of your magical attacks while riding a mine cart.<LF><LF>Also, the speed of the mine cart can be increased by moving toward the forward-end<LF>and decreased by moving toward the back-end.

When "{017E}Fish" is displayed on the screen, press {017E} to choose your bait<LF>and begin fishing. When your rod bends, press {017E} to hook the fish,<LF>then hold the direction opposite the fish's position to reduce its HP.<LF>When the fish's HP reaches zero, you will automatically land it.
Press {017F}/{01C2A4} while airborne for a skull-cracking special attack.
Press {01C297} while moving toward an enemy to perform an evasive sidestep that places you behind them.
Press {01C280} at the right moment after a sidestep for a unique attack.
Press {017F} to unleash heavy attacks that can more easily break an enemy's guard.
